title: spack create -t r gives wrong signature for configure_args in template

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
This is related to issue #21760
The template for a new RPackage package generated from spack create -t r
includes a templated dummy definition
<configure_args(self, spec, prefix)>

However, the lib/spack/spack/build_systems/r.py file defines configure_args to only
accept <self> as an argument.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack create -t r r-testpackage
```
The new package.py for r-testpackage will include a definition for configure_args
with the wrong signature.

### Information on your system
```spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-ivybridge
```
